{"step_by_step_thinking": "Frederick Banting and Charles Best are known for the discovery of insulin, but not its structure and amino acid sequence. Prof. JJ Abel is known for his work on adrenal glands and the isolation of epinephrine. Rutter, Goodman and Uhlich are not associated with the discovery of insulin's structure. Frederick Sanger, however, is known for his work on the structure of proteins, especially that of insulin, for which he was awarded the Nobel Prize.", "answer_choice": "B. Frederick Sanger"}
